A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Some people here want to use the original movies as a lens to judge the current ones. The original were the best\, but these are also well told stories. These movies served as a means for me to introduce my wife to Star Wars. That they stand on their own without a need to know the previous movies while at the same time paying homage to the originals speaks to how good these movies are. If you liked 7 you’ll like 8. It’s like Empire to a New Hope. Dark but will an ever present hope. Ignore the sourpuss fan boy posts here and go enjoy a good movie.
